member.name: M:FFImageLoading.TaskParameterExtensions.Into(FFImageLoading.Work.TaskParameter,UIKit.UIImageView,System.Single)
member.summary: Loads the image into given imageView using defined parameters.
member.param: Image view that should receive the image.
Optional scale factor to use when interpreting the image data. If unspecified it will use the device scale (ie: Retina = 2, non retina = 1)

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.TaskParameterExtensions.Into(FFImageLoading.Work.TaskParameter,UIKit.UITabBarItem,System.Single)
member.summary: Loads the image into given imageView using defined parameters.
member.param: Image view that should receive the image.
Optional scale factor to use when interpreting the image data. If unspecified it will use the device scale (ie: Retina = 2, non retina = 1)

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.TaskParameterExtensions.Into(FFImageLoading.Work.TaskParameter,UIKit.UIButton,System.Single)
member.summary: Loads the image into given UIButton using defined parameters.
member.param: UIButton that should receive the image.
Optional scale factor to use when interpreting the image data. If unspecified it will use the device scale (ie: Retina = 2, non retina = 1)

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.TaskParameterExtensions.IntoAsync(FFImageLoading.Work.TaskParameter,UIKit.UIImageView,System.Single)
member.summary: Loads the image into given imageView using defined parameters. IMPORTANT: It throws image loading exceptions - you should handle them
member.param: Image view that should receive the image.
Optional scale factor to use when interpreting the image data. If unspecified it will use the device scale (ie: Retina = 2, non retina = 1)

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.TaskParameterExtensions.AsUIImageAsync(FFImageLoading.Work.TaskParameter,System.Single)
member.summary: Loads and gets UIImage using defined parameters. IMPORTANT: It throws image loading exceptions - you should handle them

member.summary: Loads the image into given UIButton using defined parameters. IMPORTANT: It throws image loading exceptions - you should handle them
member.param: UIButton that should receive the image.
Optional scale factor to use when interpreting the image data. If unspecified it will use the device scale (ie: Retina = 2, non retina = 1)

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.TaskParameterExtensions.InvalidateAsync(FFImageLoading.Work.TaskParameter,FFImageLoading.Cache.CacheType)
member.summary: Invalidate the image corresponding to given parameters from given caches.

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.TaskParameterExtensions.Preload(FFImageLoading.Work.TaskParameter)
member.summary: Preloads the image request into memory cache/disk cache for future use.

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.TaskParameterExtensions.PreloadAsync(FFImageLoading.Work.TaskParameter)
member.summary: Preloads the image request into memory cache/disk cache for future use. IMPORTANT: It throws image loading exceptions - you should handle them

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.TaskParameterExtensions.DownloadOnly(FFImageLoading.Work.TaskParameter)
member.summary: Downloads the image request into disk cache for future use if not already exists. Only Url Source supported.

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.TaskParameterExtensions.DownloadOnlyAsync(FFImageLoading.Work.TaskParameter)
member.summary: Downloads the image request into disk cache for future use if not already exists. Only Url Source supported. IMPORTANT: It throws image loading exceptions - you should handle them

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.ImageService.Config
member.summary: Gets FFImageLoading configuration

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.ImageService.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes FFImageLoading with a default Configuration. Also forces to run disk cache cleaning routines (avoiding delay for first image loading tasks)

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.ImageService.Initialize(FFImageLoading.Config.Configuration)
member.summary: Initializes FFImageLoading with a given Configuration. It allows to configure and override most of it. Also forces to run disk cache cleaning routines (avoiding delay for first image loading tasks)

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.ImageService.LoadFile(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a new TaskParameter to load an image from a file.

member.summary: Constructs a new TaskParameter to load an image from a URL.
member.param: How long the file will be cached on disk

member.summary: Constructs a new TaskParameter to load an image from a file from application bundle.

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.ImageService.LoadCompiledResource(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a new TaskParameter to load an image from a compiled drawable resource.
member.param: Name of the resource in drawable folder without extension

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.ImageService.LoadStream(System.Func{System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Threading.Tasks.Task{System.IO.Stream}})
member.summary: Constructs a new TaskParameter to load an image from a Stream.
member.param: A function that allows a CancellationToken and returns the Stream to use. This function will be invoked by LoadStream().

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.ImageService.ExitTasksEarly
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether ImageService will exit tasks earlier
member.value: true if it should exit tasks early; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.ImageService.SetExitTasksEarly(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets a value indicating whether ImageService will exit tasks earlier
member.param: If set to true exit tasks early.

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.ImageService.SetPauseWork(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets a value indicating if all loading work should be paused (silently canceled).
member.param: If set to true pause/cancel work.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.ImageService.PauseWork
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this ImageService will pause tasks execution.
member.value: true if pause work; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Cancel any loading work for the given ImageView
